title: angi toTTEne
sahitya:
angi toTTEne gOpi shrngAravAdEne hAla kuDidEne gOpi AkaLa kAidEne


caraNam 1    cakkuli koDu enage gOpi akkaradi bandene gollara 
makkaLa ellaroDa gUDi halavu gOvgaLa kAidu bandene
    caraNam 2    ammaNNi koDu enage gOpi beNNeya tOre mEle gammane 
taTakane mosarane savidu summane toTTiloLu lOluDuvenu
    caraNam 3    appacci koDu enage gOpi tuppava koDe mEle appage hELi 
Toppige koDise uppu kaDaleyannu cIladi tumbuve
    caraNam 4    ceNDu koDu enage gOpi cinikolu bEkalla guNDu kallinanda 
buttiya kaTTi hiNDu gOvugaLa kAidu bandene
    caraNam 5    I lIegaLa kELi gOpi tOLinoL bigidappi shrIlOla 
purandara viTTalana lIleyindali bArenuta
